stocks.name: Marvell Technology
stocks.reason: Connected storage and high-speed data center semiconductors. AI infrastructure play with less crowding than NVDA. Customers consolidating suppliers to Marvell for storage + networking. Strong execution, 30%+ revenue growth.

fundamentals.catalyst: Data center consolidation, AI storage demand, networking TAM expansion

stocks.name: Datadog
stocks.reason: Cloud monitoring SaaS with recurring revenue model. Enterprise customers expanding Datadog footprint across infrastructure. AI integration into monitoring is creating new revenue streams. 40%+ revenue growth, path to 25%+ FCF margins.

fundamentals.catalyst: Improved operating leverage, AI features driving expansion, marketplace growth

stocks.name: CrowdStrike Holdings
stocks.reason: Endpoint security leader consolidating enterprise security stack. Zero-trust architecture is now mandatory after breach epidemics. Net retention >120%. Moving from point solution to comprehensive platform. High gross margins 80%+.

fundamentals.catalyst: Platform consolidation wins, deferred revenue inflection, international expansion

stocks.name: Natera Inc
stocks.reason: Genetic testing pioneer with liquid biopsy technology for cancer detection. TAM expanding as screening becomes standard care. Transitioning to subscription model for recurring revenue. Real healthcare technology with defensive moat. High risk/high reward.

fundamentals.catalyst: Cancer screening TAM expansion, insurance reimbursement increases, subscription adoption

stocks.name: Gilead Sciences
stocks.reason: Biotech with proven cash flow generation and strong R&D pipeline. Portfolio includes HIV, hepatitis C treatments with recurring revenue. More contrarian than pure SaaS plays. Dividend yield + growth. Real drugs for real diseases.

fundamentals.catalyst: New CAR-T approvals, liver disease pipeline, dividend + buybacks

history.reasoning: Initial balanced portfolio with AI exposure and safety

history.action: Strategic portfolio revision - AI infrastructure focus
history.reasoning: Thesis: AI infrastructure buildout (SMCI servers) + storage for AI data (PSTG) + AI cloud leaders (NVDA, MSFT) + crypto as alternative inflation hedge and sector momentum play (COIN). All 5 have >8.2 strength with clear catalysts.

history.action: Portfolio redesign - smaller cap, more interesting companies
history.reasoning: Thesis: Move away from mega-cap safety plays. MRVL + DDOG benefit from AI/cloud growth but less crowded. CRWD is platform consolidation winner. NTRA is small-cap genetic testing revolutionizing healthcare. GILD is contrarian biotech with cash flow. Mix of growth (NTRA, DDOG, MRVL) and value (GILD) with real catalysts.
